title: Lamar Odom In 'Fragile State' After Two Emergency Surgeries
text:
Lamar Odom In 'Fragile State' After Two Emergency Surgeries 
Published By: JustJared.com - Today 
Lamar Odom is reportedly in a “fragile mental state” after having to go through two emergency surgeries, according to TMZ. The 35-year-o... Read Full Story ... Related articles:
